line.text: That thou hast her it is not all my grief
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And yet it may be said I loved her dearly
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That she hath thee is of my wailing chief
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A loss in love that touches me more nearly
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Loving offenders thus I will excuse ye
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou dost love her because thou know I love her
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And for my sake even so doth she abuse me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Suffring my friend for my sake to approve her
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If I lose thee my loss is my love gain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And losing her my friend hath found that loss
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Both find each other and I lose both twain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And both for my sake lay on me this cross
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But here the joy my friend and I are one
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Sweet flattery then she loves but me alone
